description: This module can be used by havok/config/manager to provide default havok configuration. This will merge all the separate havok config files and create all the default havok settings.

properties.name: bootstrap
properties.summary: An array of modules for havok/bootstrap to load.

properties.name: less
properties.summary: A mapping of less modules to load and parse. If set to false, client side less parsing is disabled.

properties.name: merge
properties.summary: An array of modules for havok/config/manager to load and merge.
